chart.name: chart.customer.invoice.per.state
chart.title: Customer Per State
chart.dataset: select count(partner.name) as partner_number, state.name as state_name from account_invoice as account left join base_partner partner on partner.id=account.partner left join base_address as address on partner.main_address=address.id left join gst_state as state on address.state=state.id Group By (state.name);

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status.amount
chart.title: Amount Chart
chart.dataset: select count(id),status_select,sum(in_tax_total) as amount from account_invoice as invoice Group By(status_select)

chart.name: chart.invoice.per.status.invoice_number
chart.title: No Of Invoice
chart.dataset: select count(id),status_select as status from account_invoice as invoice Group By(status_select)
